about_the_game:
Hold Your Defense!

In the far future, people build a base on a strange planet they don't know about to protect their limited resources.
Aliens from the planet are constantly attacking your base, and you have to protect it by making defenses against them.

Your mission is to deal with different enemies by figuring out their weak spots and good ways to defend yourself.
You won't be able to beat enemies that are getting stronger, faster, and more numerous if you don't.

In all but a few stages, enemies will come in along a set path, and you'll need to put your towers correctly to stop them.
Resources are added to your inventory whenever you defeat your enemies and use these resources to build or upgrade towers that will block stronger enemies.

Play this for tactical and challenging fun.

TACTIC AND MIND GAME, THE CORE FUN OF TOWER DEFENSE

Over 40 colorful maps spread out over 5 different alien worlds, and swarms of over 10 strange monsters with different abilities and traits based on their height and other factors attack the base. You need to build and improve defense towers that can keep waves of monsters away. A good plan is only half the battle. Aim for the perfect time and test your limits while fighting against the enemies.

VARIOUS GAME MODES

There are different types of tests in each stage, such as defense, survival, gathering, and boss attacks. There are 40+ stages in all, and each one has three difficulty levels. There are only so many special weapons that can be used in each stage, which makes the planning harder.
You can also play against other users in a challenge stage that is set up just for you, and there is an infinite mode where you can fight an endless number of enemies.

ADORABLE TOWERS AND MONSTERS

There are eight differ ent kinds of towers that protect the base from different enemies. You may notice these enemies look cute from time to time. Even at twice the speed, the crazy battle between towers and monsters has a unique and dangerous charm. Take a deep breath and attack!

PROVEN GAME ELEMENTS AND FUN

The mobile version of was the number one strategy game in 86 countries. It was also the number one app overall in the UK, Australia, France, China, Austria, Sweden, and Denmark. On your PC, you can have the same great fun that people from all over the world have.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Ryzen 2200g / Intel i3 8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM(GT1030)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 6400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
